text: Tamagra rama'a hoza nentazanagi, nezama'a osi'a e'nerize. Tamagra ne'zana nenazanagi, tamamura nosie. Tamagra tina nenazanagi, mago'ene tinkura tamave'nesie. Tamagra kukena nehazanagi, anazamo'a tamavufga azeri amuhoa nosie. Tamagra zago eri'zana erita kutamifina erinerizanagi, hagro hu'nea kutamifi erinerize.
